page.title: 16INTERVIEW (CONTINUED)
page.content: He also said"The O.A.P's need some sort of service to Kettering Hospital or if they were too old to travel they could have a visit by the doctor." To keep the rate of vandalism down,he said"We need some policemen on the beat like in the old days".He also said"We need a bigger and better police station in Raunds." He said we could do with getting the industries near the town and getting a car park away from the town centre. When asked what he wanted in Raunds he said he would like a swimming pool.He then went on to schools and said"We need more discipline in them." To help the people who live away from the town centre he said"We need more shops on the outlying estates.Leave the public houses as they are." His hobbies are gardening,photography and walking."
